function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of Covid-19 in artificial environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene measures and ventilation protocols","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless technology","People":"Residents, workers, students, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation and air circulation in homes","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission within households","Mitigation":"Installing proper ventilation systems and air purifiers","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Household members","Owner":"Homeowners, landlords"},{"Description":"Inadequate isolation facilities in homes","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within households","Mitigation":"Creating separate isolation rooms with good sanitation and outdoor access","Technologies":"Sanitation technologies, home design modifications","People":"COVID-19 sufferers, family members","Owner":"Homeowners, architects"}]}
